1.content:
In 1929,Sherri was 12 years old flying in her parents' charter plane when they encountered bad weather and crashed into the south part of Africia near the Ivory Coast. Both of her parents and the pilot died almost instantly. But she miraculously survived but was unconscious for a few hours but recovered.

Fortunately she had enough rations for a week and various books to read that was somehow not burnt by the plane crash. The area was not urban but rural. Since she had some training in Jungle Survival, she built a fire and a decent lean-to. But she knew that her survival would not last that long unless someone help her. The next day she woke up to see a fairly friendly figure looking at her. She recognized it as
1.title: The Beginning of Sherrizan

choices: She stayed with Boola another two weeks.
She stayed with Boola for another two months
She waved and headed for a nearby village.
She waved and headed for a greater challenge
11.content:
Boola was the leaders of the ape in that area and had lots of muscles and gymnastic skills due to tree swinging. He felt sorry for her and took her to the area where he lived to care for her. Sherri was terrified of him at first. But she quickly realized that he was giving her additional skills in the jungle as well as muscle strength.
Within a month, she knew all of the plants and its good qualities, including the bad plants.

Within a couple of months, Sherri could swing on the vines easily too. She felt free training and playing with the apes. But she knew it was soon to time to leave. Now, due to the excellent dieting and training, she was now 3X as good as when Boola first found her. But was it time for her to leave her allies? With hand signals, she asked Boola about it. But Boola suddenly spoke in broken English. ' Up to you, friend. You go or can stay bit longer'
11.title: an large muscular ape

12.content:
Sheena was doing her morning jog to stay fit and strong. Living in Africa has not been easy in spite of her training and great fighting skills and strength. Some people still look down on her since she was female. Even though she had her supporters, Sheena was upset last night at a village chief 's rejection for her help in finding a vile game hunter trespassing in his territory.

While jogging, she thought ' well, let the chief lose his livestock one by one to that hunter' After a hour jogging she was just breaking a slight sweat, Sheena heard an eagle calling to her about a lost young girl nearby at a campfire who might need her help. Quickly Sheena jogged in that direction and found the smoke from the fire. Sheena found Sherri eating an apricot with a worried face. Sheena approached Sherri with a smile and said Peace, I am not here to hurt you but to help you.

Sherri looked at her with a puzzled look on the face and said 'How could you help me? I am not helpless BUT not that good.' Sheena smiled at her initial skepticism and flexed slightly but not too much. Sheena did not want to scare her but quickly unflexed. She thought that there could be many things to train her. Sheena said 'Well, first, I will be willing to teach you to
12.title: Sheena

121.content:
Sherri thought a minute and said ' I used to have a dog and wondered what they were thinking sometimes. It would have been great if I could have communicate with them back them. So communicating with the wild animals would be my first choice to learn.'

Sheena smiled and said 'Okay, which one would be your first choice?'
121.title: communicate with the wild animals

122.content:
Sheena added ' Besides being strong, knowing how to fight is more important out here. Do you know Jungle Judo or how to use a spear/weapon well?'

Sherri shook her head and replied ' I know both of it just barely. Hey, I am just 12 years old, you know.'

Sheen proudly responded ' Well, I know it well and am an expert teacher. I know secrets that will help you learn it quicker than an average person. Since I could use a partner soon, I want to teach you now. What do you wish to learn first... the Jungle Judo OR how to use a spear/weapon?'

Sherri's eyes lit up. She was beginning to like Sheena. Sherri replied to her excitedly
122.title: hand to hand/ spear combat!

choices: They find the elders so they learn where to find the golden necklace
They go on the journey to the Temple of the Gods in the mountains
They decide to do something completely different instead
124.content:
Sheena looked at Sherri and a smile formed on her face.

"You know something? Since nobody knows who you are... You have a great advantage! We can make you into a powerful female warrior who will defend the natives and the forest people and the animals... And the outsiders will have no clue to who you are! Hmmm..." Sheena said to her, as she pondered what to do next.

"Is... Is that good... or bad?" Sherri stuttered.

"A little bit of both! You need to become stronger so you can defend yourself... And those who are weaker than you! But, there is little time... I need to take you to the Temple of the Gods..."

"Why? What? What's that?"

"There, you will find a stream of water from the Gods... Drink from it, and you will become stronger!" Sheena explained.

"Wow!"

"Or... I must help you find the golden necklace... This is hidden away... Only the elders can tell us where it is located! Once you wear it, you will become powerful and strong! I must take you to meet with the elders!" Sheena pondered.

"Uhh..." Sherri stuttered, feeling confused.

So which do they do?
124.title: get stronger physically

choices: Sherri become a amazon 12 feet high, muscular and sexy.
Sherri become a large and muscular goddess with infinite powers.
1241.content: Sheena then decided to accompany Sherri to the hut of the elders, to know where it was possible to find the legendary gold necklace. The two girls, however, did not imagine that luck was on their side more than when they could ever hope to have. In fact, when they reached the entrance of the hut of the elderly, the guards, recognizing Sheena, enter both the left. It was then that the two girls came to know the elders that a cruel violator had dared to steal their gold necklace, but that was then stopped and the arrest by the warriors who were guarding the entrance of the hut and the artifact was now in possession of the elderly. When Sheena asked with respect to be able to take the necklace for Sherri, the elderly remembered everything the Amazon savanna had done to their land, and they agreed. Both satisfied and excited, the two girls came out of the hut with the artifact and returned to the place where they had met for the first time. Sheena diets necklace of gold at the young Sherri and said that would be enough to wear it to activate its mystical powers. Sherri, without hesitation, did what he had told her friend.

choices: They noticed an injured giraffe  that was maimed.

1242.content:
Sherri said 'Let's go to the temple and find the water to drink. If we got the necklace, there is a chance that I could lose it.' Sheena nodded in agreement. After a quick breakfast, they packed a few supplies and headed on the journey to the Temple.

On the way, Sherri was impressed with the reasonable size of Sheena's biceps. It was about the size of an good female athlete. Sherri said ' Do you think that the water will get my biceps to your size?'

Sheena replied ' It depends on how much you drink, The size of the biceps can be more too.But, after all, surviving in the jungle is far more than just strength. It is building a decent shelter, finding food, water, recognizing animals and insects, and knowing where you are....and knowing how to fight.'
Sherri nodded. After all, she knew some survival training but not much. She smiled and thought 'I can get used to this. City living can be too crowded.'

Soon, they stood on top of a hill. In the distance, both of them could use the Temple. Sherri said ' It may take another hour or two before we can get there. But since we have been walking a while, let us take a break.'

While resting, both of them noticed something/someone
1242.title: They go on the journey to the Temple of the God...

12421.content:
"Hey, what's that over there?" Sherri asked pointing to what looked like an animal a few yards away.

"That's a giraffe! It looks like its hurt!" Sheena started running over to it with Sherri right behind her. When they got up to it, Sheena placed a consoling hand on it trying to comfort it. From the looks of it, the wound was very serious and was caused not by another beast, but by a human. The giraffe was in serious pain and was growling almost non-stop. Sheena said to the giraffe softly, "I'm sorry, there is nothing I can do to heal you. I can at least save you from the pain and give you a proper burial. Would that be okay?" Sherri was surprised that Sheena was able to communicate with an injured animal like this, but was even more amazed that the giraffe seemed to nod at her.

Without so much as a blink, Sheena took out her knife and stabbed the giraffe, ending its life. Sherri cried out in shock and Sheena too was almost crying. After giving it a proper burial and consoling each other, Sheena told Sherri, "Sadly, this is the law of the jungle. There are certain animals that we do not hunt nor prey on. Giraffe's are one of them. They are considered sacred creatures to this jungle."

The two women looked at the small mound of earth where they had buried the animal and continued their hike through the mountains. Along the way, Sheena began explaining the basics of survival, how to find food, water and shelter. For example, determining the time of the day by the sun's position and determining where north was. She also explained using the natural geography and features to pinpoint and locate oneself with respect to another location. Sherri was quiet as the other athletic woman explained this to her. She was still a bit shaken from what she saw earlier, but nonetheless steeled herself for what was about to come later on.

Finally after a long hike they finally come across...
12421.title: They noticed an injured giraffe  that was maimed.

choices: Sherri gladly ate the rest of the spinach.
Sherri refused so Sheena had to force it down Sherri's throat.

The garden was very small. it was so small, the amount of spinach would be enough for one can only. There were just 4 tiny plants. Sheena knew that the spinach would just increase muscles temporarily. But she did not want it to go to waste. She smiled. If they ate it, they would be more rested and alert when they arrive at the Temple. Sheena did NOT want for anyone else to eat it except for herself and Sherri.

Sheena said to Sherri ' I know that spinach taste yucky but it will give you some strength temporarily. Eat some, To prove it that works, i will eat half first.' Sheena grabbed half of it and quickly swallowed it. Almost instantly, some 2 or 3 inches of muscles grew on her already fit body. Quickly, Sheena felt alert again and not tired. Then Sheena took the rest of it to Sherri to eat. Now, it is your turn to eat and get some strength temporarily

Still Sherri refused, thinking that she might throw up while eating it. Sheena smiled, understanding her fears. But Sheena could not wait. She grabbed the spinach and forced open Sherri's throat. Involuntarily, the spinach went in Sherri's mouth and down the throat. Sheena held Sherri's mouth open.

Sherri shook for a few seconds as the process of the muscles started growing in her. Almost instantly, some 2 or 3 inches of muscles grew on Sherri's own fairly fit body. She was now more alert too and felt much stronger.

Sherri smiled and said ' Hey, spinach is not so bad. I could learn to like it.' But before, they left. Sheena secretly stashed one more patch of spinach to take with them.

Sheena said 'Hey, let us go to the Temple of the God and drink the water now.' Are you ready to go now.'

1242321.content:
The temple was not huge and fairly well concealed in the jungle. Sheena excitedly said to Sherri. 'Looks like we are here. Let me try to find an entrance. After 10 minutes of searching the ground, neither one of them could find it. Sheena frowned and commented that maybe the door was concealed, somehow moved, or blocked off.

Sheena pointed to one section of the wall and said ' I am sure that the door used to be here. We could try breaking through it. But the door could be booby trapped or there was no door after all. Or we could try to get to the top and just break our way down to the ground. However the second option is more dangerous. We can't fly and just jumping down could kill us.

Sherri said 'Guess we will have to give up and go elsewhere. Sheena smiled ' Remember the Spinach. Take some more. Greater strength could help you here.' This time, Sherri swallowed it without resistance. Since it was a larger portion, both Sherri and Sheena took half each. Each one of their muscles grew another 4 inches.

Yet Sheena felt that it was not enough. But Sherri wanted to try to get in. She said " Sheena, both of us have some jungle survival training. Besides maybe we are stronger than we realized. This is wild spinach, not the domestic kind back in the US. I just realized that while reading the Survival Book a week ago before the trip here. "

Then Sheena smiled. "Well, I am willing to take a chance. How do you wish to get in the temple?"
Sherri looked back at the temple and decided to
1242321.title: They arrived but could not find an entrance.

12423211.content:
Sheena examined the small hilltop from where she and Sherri were standing and saw that they could climb up to the top of the cavern and dig their way in from up above.

"Follow me!" she instructed.

Sheena started to climb up the rocky walls of the outer cavern until she came to a patch of grass. Sherri was quietly behind her.

Then Sheena started to wander around, looking for something she could pull on from the ground. She saw a small plant. She walked up to the plant and started pulling on it.

"Come! Help me pull it out of the ground!"

Both her and Sherri started pulling on the plant until it came out completely, exposing the roots, and leaving a small hole in the ground.

"Get a rock with a sharp end so we can start digging!"

Sherri got a rock and so did Sheena. After ten minutes of digging, the hole got deep enough, that it created an opening in the ground, leading to the upper ceiling of a hidden cavern!

"I hear running water!" Sherri noted.

"Yes... The Spring of the Gods!" Sheena smiled.

Then Sheena slid down the hole, legs-first, and landed on the cavern floor. Sherri followed behind her, and they used the light from the hole in the ceiling to guide them through the darkness.

"Now that we got in... How will we get out?" Sherri asked her.

"There is only one way... Through brute force, which you get from great strength!" Sheena explained.

Then, Sheena pointed at a small pond of water, which was before them.

"Drink the water from the Spring of the Gods!" she ordered, as Sherri got down on her knees before the small pond. She dipped her hands in the water and drank a sip of the liquid.

"Ummm... I was so thirsty!"

"Drink more! It will make you strong!"

Sherri smiled as she took another sip of the enchanted spring...

Jane groaned a little bit. ' I did always like that English dress that made me look so proper.' But she smiled ' I can find a tailor that can make a new one for me with room to spare.' She flexed her biceps and smiled ' Wow, this does me make look more confident and healthy. I may be able to challenge Tarzan now. I hope that Tarzan will accept the new ME.'

Jane and Sherri baked a few potatoes with some sour cream and shredded cheese on top for dinner later. Meanwhile, Jane and Sherri found some fighting sketches that Tarzan had in his room and practiced that for an hour. They were barely tired when Tarzan came home.

Sherri beamed at Jane and said to Tarzan ' Do you like the New improved Jane? She can help you out around the jungle. Jane smiled seductively and flexed. Tarzan was not that impressed yet not mad. He said Mmmm, the jungle do not care about the females. You will still have to survive out here. And the warrior tribes, for the most part, are not friendly. 1452111.content: Sherri knew she had some supposedly magical means at her disposal and decided to use them. She pulled out two items: a can of spinach and a piece of paper with a strange word on it. The word was supposedly a magical acronym that could bestow the combined abilities of mighty heroes onto whoever said it. Great strength, stamina, and power were key aspects of this transformation. The spinach was also said to bestow great strength and belonged to a legendary sailor who had many adventures against various foes. Some stories described women getting a taste of the same power and reveling in it. Which should Sherri choose?

info.brief_description: This is a different twist from the Tarzan stories on a new character Sherri
info.description:
This time, on another part of the jungle that Tarzan was unaware, someone else was marooned as a young rather fit girl before being rescued by ____. But Tarzan was not aware of it since they were miles and miles apart.

Please NO sex,bad language, nudity,or killing off Sherrizan ( Sherri as her nickname). Keep it up to PG13.

Yes, it is muscle growth but the amount is up to you. And not everything have to be MG. She do not have to be that strong if you wish that she is not. But she is somewhat intelligent.

(this is just a fan fiction story. I do NOT make any money from it. This is just for fun and those who wish to show or practice their creative writing.)
